page.title: 03Religeon & Church Lansallos
page.content: There are at present 2 churches in Polperro,1 is C of E and the other Methodist. There were many factions of the Methodist faith in the past and there are about 10 building that were used for worship in the village and surrounding area.Predominately a Methodist community for many years anything 'different' was quite distinctive-hence 'THE JEWS HOUSE' in Lansallos St.,Probably dating back to the 18th Century. The timbers of St Johns,the C of E church,were found to be dangerously rotten in 1985 and were completely replaced by local tradesmen,financed by local donations.
